hero.paragraph: I create modern web applications using the latest technologies. I specialize in React, Node.js and modern frameworks.

about.title: About Me
about.paragraph: I am a fullstack web developer with one year of experience creating scalable, performant, and intuitive web applications. My passion is finding elegant solutions to complex problems.

contacts.title: Let's work together
contacts.paragraph: Ready to discuss your project and find the best solution..
